title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Philadelphia, Pennsylvania
content:
Photo submitted by Bas Slabbers, “Got the bike a few weeks ago and I am now exploring our local trails… Which means taking the wrong turn and having to peddle back up the hill you just came from is part of that too.” We always love seeing photos from where you are riding and are happy […]

author: Kristi Benedict
